column4: sorry, you're supposed to have taken a full backup before you upgraded. The splash screen on the livecd really should say that I think...
broken sound is the commonest issue I've seen on this list for 8.X -> 9.04. Next is observations that 9.04 is slower. Google '9.04 sound'. No cure for the sluggishness I know of
thank you for trying to help. sorry I'm an asshole.
you aren't even close. Stick around on this group. They could give lessons...
